benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to payment

covered: Valid Request (TC01-TC04) covers successful updates with required and optional headers
Missing Body (TC08) covers missing body cases
Malformed JSON (TC09) covers malformed payload handling
Validation / Invalid Payload (TC05, TC10, TC16, TC18) covers various data issues
Server Error Handling (TC12) covers 500 server errors
Edge Cases: Large field count (TC14), Max length (TC15), Large payload (TC20) cover extreme payload scenarios
Integration / Data Consistency (TC17) verifies end-to-end update and subsequent retrieval
gaps: Partial Update: no explicit test ensuring partial updates are rejected or accepted per API semantics
403 Forbidden scenario: not explicitly tested (beyond 401 Unauthorized)
Missing Content-Type header or related header handling: not tested
recommendations: Add a Partial Update test to validate API behavior when only a subset of fields is provided (whether updates are partial, full replace, or rejected)
Add Rate Limiting tests to verify behavior under high request load
Add tests for Caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) to validate caching behavior
Add a 403 Forbidden scenario to cover insufficient-permission paths beyond the 401 unauthorized case
Add tests for content-type validation (e.g., missing or incorrect Content-Type header) to strengthen request validation
